Investor Relations

# 

Corporate Governance 

The Board of Directors of Harvard Bioscience, Inc. (the "Company") sets high standards for the Company's employees, officers and directors. Implicit in this philosophy is the importance of sound corporate governance. It is the duty of the Board of Directors to serve as a prudent fiduciary for shareholders and to oversee the management of the Company's business. To fulfill its responsibilities and to discharge its duty, the Board of Directors follows the procedures and standards that are set forth in these guidelines. These guidelines are subject to modification from time to time as the Board of Directors deems appropriate in the best interests of the Company or as required by applicable laws and regulations.

##  Our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics

Investor Relations

# 

Investor FAQs 

[Show All](#)

Where is Harvard Bioscience, Inc.'s stock traded?

Harvard Bioscience, Inc. common stock is traded on the NASDAQ National Market under the ticker symbol "HBIO."

Where are Harvard Bioscience, Inc.'s headquarters located? 

84 October Hill Road, Suite 10 Holliston, MA 01746-1371

Can I buy Harvard Bioscience, Inc.'s stock directly from the Company? 

Harvard Bioscience, Inc. does not offer a direct stock purchase plan. Shares of the Company should be purchased through a broker.

Does Harvard Bioscience, Inc. pay a dividend? 

Harvard Bioscience, Inc. does not pay a dividend at this time.

Who is Harvard Bioscience, Inc. 's transfer agent? 

Computershare, Inc. 150 Royall Street Suite 101 Canton, Massachusetts 02021 800-942-5909 or 312-360-5195 Monday – Friday 8 AM – 5 PM ET

Who do I contact about replacement of stock certificates?

To replace lost certificates, contact the transfer agent, Computershare, Inc. at 800-942-5909 or 312-360-5195 Monday – Friday 8 AM – 5 PM ET

What is Harvard Bioscience, Inc.'s fiscal year? 

Harvard Bioscience, Inc.'s fiscal year ends December 31st. Fiscal First Quarter ends 3/31, Fiscal Second Quarter ends 6/30, Fiscal Third Quarter ends 9/30 and Fiscal Fourth Quarter ends 12/31.
